name: Pixelated
description: The colors in the album art have been grouped into bigger blocks.

name: Bubbles
description: Pixels in the album art are randomly picked and blown up into large bubbles.

name: Blobs
description: You can only see hints of prominent shapes in the album art, with reduced colors.

name: Zoomed In
description: You can only see a small part of the album art.

name: Blinds (Horizontal)
description: Only a few lines of the album art can be seen.

name: Blinds (Vertical)
description: Only a few lines of the album art can be seen.

name: Tiles
description: A few small tiles of the album art are randomly picked and revealed.

name: Shuffled
description: The album art has been split up into tiny pieces and shuffled.
